Html: Say I have 3 way points but don't want a triangle, I want a circle connecting them. Is there a way to have the Polygon Lines curve at a certain radius? I could calculate all the numbers pretty easily its just knowing how to implement the curving line. Is there anything built in to GMap?
You can write a function to draw an arc from circle equation just you have to determine the start, end angles of the arc and the circle radius.
